entry.title: We’re shipping a funding rate. Here’s why and how.

entry.title: Apeing in Responsibly: Managing risk in the Float Alpha
entry.summary: “Apeing In Responsibly (AIR)” — the practice of depositing a large amount of liquidity in a protocol while understanding the risks. E.g. “Remember to AIR.”
